Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size < 2,
    imgLightTheme_Settings.Height / 2 + imgLightTheme_Settings.Y,
    Parent.Height - Self.Height
)

Switch(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size,
    ScreenSize.Small,
    (Parent.Height - Parent.PaddingTop - Parent.PaddingBottom) / 3,
    Parent.Height - Parent.PaddingTop - Parent.PaddingBottom
)

Switch(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size,
    ScreenSize.Small,
    Parent.Width - Parent.PaddingLeft - Parent.PaddingRight,
    ScreenSize.Medium,
    Parent.Width / 3 - Parent.LayoutGap,
    ScreenSize.Large,
    Parent.Width / 4 - Parent.LayoutGap,
    Parent.Width / 6 - Parent.LayoutGap
)

If(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size < 2,
    imgDarkTheme_Settings.Height / 2 + imgDarkTheme_Settings.Y,
    Parent.Height - Self.Height
)

Switch(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size,
    ScreenSize.Small,
    (Parent.Height - Parent.PaddingTop - Parent.PaddingBottom) / 3,
    Parent.Height - Parent.PaddingTop - Parent.PaddingBottom
)

Switch(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size,
    ScreenSize.Small,
    Parent.Width - Parent.PaddingLeft - Parent.PaddingRight,
    ScreenSize.Medium,
    Parent.Width / 3 - Parent.LayoutGap,
    ScreenSize.Large,
    Parent.Width / 4 - Parent.LayoutGap,
    Parent.Width / 6 - Parent.LayoutGap
)

If(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size < 2,
    imgContrastTheme_Settings.Height / 2 + imgContrastTheme_Settings.Y,
    Parent.Height - Self.Height
)

Switch(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size,
    ScreenSize.Small,
    (Parent.Height - Parent.PaddingTop - Parent.PaddingBottom) / 3,
    Parent.Height - Parent.PaddingTop - Parent.PaddingBottom
)

Switch(
    App.ActiveScreen.Size,
    ScreenSize.Small,
    Parent.Width - Parent.PaddingLeft - Parent.PaddingRight,
    ScreenSize.Medium,
    Parent.Width / 3 - Parent.LayoutGap,
    ScreenSize.Large,
    Parent.Width / 4 - Parent.LayoutGap,
    Parent.Width / 6 - Parent.LayoutGap
)

CustomProperties.Name: SettingsWidth
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Set settings width based on parent screen

CustomProperties.Name: SettingsHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Set hight of the settings panel

CustomProperties.Name: BlockWidth
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Set the block width in the screen
